data.description: Traditional Kerala-style 'Nalukettu' G+2 4BHK house designed for a joint family on an 80x100 feet plot with dedicated home office and floor-to-ceiling windows. The design adheres to local building norms and Vastu principles, with a central courtyard and North-facing entrance.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall (Naalu Thattu)
rooms.description: North-facing main entry with open space to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Formal dining area integrated with the living space.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Cozy guest room adjacent to the entrance for visiting relatives.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with privacy and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen integrated into the communal living area.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for appliances and storage near the kitchen.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open central courtyard facilitating natural ventilation and light, adhering to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Grand entrance facing North as per Vastu recommendations.
Floor-to-ceiling window for maximum natural light and ventilation.
